exceptions.exn: In environment cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts Puniq : uniq pts d : dstatelet H : tpc_coh d x : [ordType of nid] Unable to unify "(x \\in dom (dstate d)) = (x \\in ?M1562 d)" with "(x \\in dom (dstate d)) = (x \\in nodes)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)
d: dstatelet

Goal:
tpc_coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K
Notation seq := list
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
tpc_coh = fun d : dstatelet => [/\ soupCoh (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes -> localCoh n (getLocal n d)] : dstatelet -> Prop
l1 : forall d : dstatelet, tpc_coh d -> valid (dstate d)
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
pred0v3 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> dom (dstate d) =i [::]
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
l2 : forall d : dstatelet, tpc_coh d -> valid (dsoup d)
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohIDom : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (d : dstatelet), InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohI p I d -> dom (dstate d) =i Protocols.Exports.nodes p d
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
pred0v1 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dstate d)
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohIVd : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (d : dstatelet), InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohI p I d -> valid (dstate d)
pred0v2 : forall d : dstatelet, cohMT d -> valid (dsoup d)
step_preserves_node_ids : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (l : Label), l \in dom s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2 -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)) =i dom (dstate (getStatelet s2 l))
mt_nodes = (fun _evar_0_ : [::] =i [::] => eq_ind_r (fun _pattern_value_ : seq [ordType of nid] => _pattern_value_ =i [::]) _evar_0_ (dom0 (union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap))) (fun x : [ordType of nid] => erefl (x \in [::])) : dom (dstate empty_dstatelet) =i [::]
Record finMap (K : ordType) (V : Type) : Type := FinMap { seq_of : seq (K * V); _ : is_true (sorted ord [seq key i | i <- seq_of]) } Arguments finMap _ _%type_scope Arguments FinMap [K] [V]%type_scope [seq_of]%seq_scope
Coh_dom : forall (w : world) (l : Label) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet), l \in dom s -> Coh w s -> dom (dstate (getStatelet s l)) =i Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)
last_key_dom : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), valid f -> last_key f \notin dom f -> f = Unit
seq_last_in : forall (A : eqType) (s : seq A) (x : A), last x s \notin s -> s = [::]
locE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (n : nid) (x : heap) (y : soup), valid (dstate d) -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n x (dstate d); dsoup := y |} = x
addn0 = fun n : nat => [eta eqP] ((fun _evar_0_ : (fun n0 : nat => is_true (n0 + 0 == n0)) 0 => (nat_ind (fun n0 : nat => n0 + 0 == n0) _evar_0_)^~ n) (eqxx 0) (fun n0 : nat => id)) : right_id 0 addn
dom_fresh : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V), fresh f \notin dom f
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
dom_freshn : forall (V : Type) (f : union_map [ordType of nat] V) (n : nat), fresh f + n \notin dom f
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohI = fun (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) => [Pred d | coh p d /\ I d (Protocols.Exports.nodes p d)] : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Simpl_Pred dstatelet Arguments InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.cohI _ _%function_scope
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
dom : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), cT -> seq K

```coq
intros.
apply cohDom with (d := d) (coh := tpc_coh).
- auto.
- apply l1.
auto.
Qed.```

original: intros. apply cohDom with (d := d) (coh := tpc_coh). - auto. - apply l1. auto.
